channel.title: Item Bonus Help Needed
channel.description: How do i change the item bonuses? :S I have done it before on a diffrent server but On this one when i change the bonuses on the item config file and then compile it dosent compile? :S the config it dosent chagne price or bonus any idea's why? :confused:

item.title: Item Bonus Help Needed
item.dc:creator: @Vesnal1 Vesnal1
item.description:
@Vesnal1 wrote:

Did you restart the server? And just as a side note, you don’t need to recompile if you are just editing cfg files. Other than that, I don’t know what the problem could be. Make sure you counted out all the numbers, there should be (I think) 15 including the prices.

Read full topic
